alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:44AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT RAPIDES...EVANGELINE... AVOYELLES...NORTHEASTERN ST. LANDRY AND NORTHEASTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 615 AM CST... At 544 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elmer, or 10 miles east of Hineston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Oakdale, Ville Platte, Marksville, Bunkie, Mamou, Simmesport, Oberlin, Glenmora, Melville, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Palmetto, Bordelonville, Bayou Current, Alexandria International Airport, Morrow, and Effie. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 26 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
